meta.content: Front Page; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

block.p: Job Growth Is Modest A modest number of jobs were created last month, as the nation's unemployment rate stayed at 4.9 percent, data showed. Stocks and bonds initially rallied on the report. Page D1.
Selling Global Warming The Clinton Administration is trying to win public support before the details are worked out on a treaty to limit heat-trapping gases. Page A10.
